Title: Hellraiser III: Hell on Earth
Writer: Peter Atkins (original story by), Tony Randel (original story by), Clive Barker (based on characters created by), Peter Atkins
Actors: Kevin Bernhardt, Lawrence Mortorff, Terry Farrell, Ken Carpenter
Plot: An investigative reporter must send the newly unbound Pinhead and his legions back to Hell.
Production: Fifth Avenue Entertainment, Trans Atlantic Entertainment
